amendment.description: To fund enhanced enforcement of intellectual property rights in foreign countries.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2013 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2013 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Allen. (consideration: CR S13367; text: CR S13367) To fund enhanced enforcement of intellectual property rights in foreign countries.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2013 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2013 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Allen.
